mapper.select: select u.idx, u.user_id, u.password, u.name, u.email, u.mobile, u.birthday, u.address1 as user_address1, u.address2 as user_address2, DATE_FORMAT(u.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as reg_date, u.company_nm, u.company_address1, u.company_address2, u.sa_eob_no, u.position, u.document_url from user_table as u where user_id = #{user_id}
